product_name: MSR Deploy TR-2 Snowshoe Poles - Pair
long_description: The MSR Deploy TR-2 snowshoe poles offer quick 1-handed adjustments and are best used for snowshoeing, ski touring and winter hikes where the poles are used mostly in hand. Collapse the Deploy TR-2 poles down into 2 sections quickly and easily. The Deploy TR-2 poles offer efficient, glove-friendly, 1-handed length adjustments so you can adapt quickly to variable terrain. The adjustment mechanisms are housed in the upper shafts creating a high center of gravity for an efficient, effortless swing. SureLock(TM) adjustment, with a positive-locking push-button mechanism, offers the confidence of absolute, nonslip performance in the field. Breakaway straps release from the grips if your pole becomes lodged; glove-friendly design lets you easily reset or adjust the straps in the field. Ergonomic dual-density polyurethane grips are highly durable and shaped to work with a broad range of hand sizes and deliver comfort on long treks. Ultralight 7000-series aluminum has an excellent strength-to-weight ratio along with durability for demanding use. MSR Deploy TR-2 grips feature a catch for raising heel lifts on your snowshoes so you don't have to bend over to do it.
